errors.error_description: Installing the library before creating and activating a virtual environment, which is the wrong order
correction_candidates: Create and activate the virtual environment first, then install the library
Install all dependencies globally without using a virtual environment
Use conda instead of pip and venv for environment management
Install the library after deactivating the virtual environment
errors.golden_answer: Create and activate the virtual environment first, then install the library

errors.error_description: Adding pysnmp-mibs as an unnecessary dependency when installing snmpclitools
correction_candidates: Remove pysnmp-mibs from the installation command
Install pysnmp-mibs separately in a different step
Replace pysnmp-mibs with pysmi in the command
errors.golden_answer: Remove pysnmp-mibs from the installation command
